sub_title: Outdoor 'entertrainer', instructor, musician, climber, rigger & designer of large props @ Larger Than Life
summary: Meeting and working with so many different people and groups every year makes me enjoy my life to the fullest. My company Larger Than Life is a harbour for all the things I love to do myself: making music, developing new activities and themes, designing sets and props, carrying out climbing activities, working with children, coaching outdoor tasks in trainings, working with people of every possible age and background, helping them to learn from one another... This is a way of life I would never change for the world, but only expand further.

projects.title: Steve Merlin's albums 'Closer To The Moon' (2008), 'Between Air And Wing' (2013), 'Crash Course For Earth' (2015) and WORK-IN-PROGRESS (2015-2023): a story-based double album.
projects.description:
The first Steve Merlin album 'Closer To The Moon' is actually an archive - compilation of songs I wrote between 1991 and 2005. After producing an album for an acoustic band, and two albums Piet van der Pol and I made for children, I'd built up experience in composing, recording, mixing and mastering.
The album 'Closer To The Moon' turned out to be a many-layered, easy-listening record, and I'm actually still happy with the result after 15 years. At the time, I was thankful for the headspace it brought for the writing of new songs.
The two albums that followed - 'Between Air And Wing' (2013) and 'Crash Course For Earth' (2015) have received a couple of very positive reviews on Progwereld, DPRP and WrittenInMusic. Performing them live has been a challenge because of my method of recording, so to get my kicks as a live performer I joined a band called Patch The Sky in 2019 playing bass, synth and vocals. Check us out at www.patchthesky.nl and do follow us on facebook and/or youtube if you like our music.
In the meanwhile, since 2015 I'm working on a double album. This fourth Steve Merlin album covers the first part of a story that I've been developing for a longer time and hopefully will come out as a novel one day. First it will see the light of day in the form of 19 tracks.

projects.title: Creative Tasks with Bamboo
projects.description:
Bamboo sticks are excellent training task material. I've been developing tasks over the years, conducting creative team work and leadership trainings using bamboo construction.
These creative tasks usually span over 1-2 hours, giving plenty opportunity for trainers and myself to observe people and/or teams in communicating, handling problems and organizing the task at hand. My Creative Tasks with Bamboo are succesfully achievable tasks for every group, and have always contributed to collective fun and enthousiasm as well as useful training input and insights in group development. 
In the end every group, sometimes divided into subteams, always comes up with a proud and magnificent product, worthy as a background for a group picture.

profile_positions.description: Started Larger Than Life in 1999, worked freelance for 20+ other outdoor companies. Developed an MO for my own company: the personal approach, for both activities and trainings. Focus on constructive interaction, positive communication, "we do this thing together", using mostly natural materials and respectfully enjoying the green outdoors (which is where you can usually find us!).
